name: Ditto: Absword Edition
description:
Play as Ditto, a common Slime that has gained sentience from absorbing a human encyclopedia! 

Utilizing his newfound Wisdom, Ditto has learned how to use the enemy's swords against them by swallowing them and spitting out! But be careful, Ditto can only have so many weapons inside him before his Weight slows him down...  

Developer's Notes

This has been our first game jam as a team, and although the game itself is a barebone representation of what it could've been (and riddled with bugs), we are still quite proud of the results :D

Be sure to check the Tutorial segment inside the game, as it lacks many basic indicators.
